content: kids love it because it s the perfect size for taking anywhere mom s love it because it s easy care machine wash & dry and knitters love it because it s made of all natural fibers fast and fun to knit **about the pattern ** this blankie is worked back and forth using one strand of yarn to create a waffle pattern with a garter stitch border **finished size ** approx 30 x 30 **materials ** 645 yards of worsted weight yarn and us size 7 32 circular needles hint use sharp tips for easier picking up of yarn without splitting **suggested yarn ** brown sheep cotton fleece - 80% cotton 20% merino 215 yards per 100 grams 3 skeins **gauge ** 19 stitches x 20 row = 4 in waffle pattern gauge is not critical but aiming for a slightly loose knitted fabric gives this blanket a wonderful drape that kids love
